meanings.definition: An agreement between parties concerning the sale of property or services at a price agreed upon.
meanings.sent1: She found great bargains at the flea market.
meanings.sent2: The store was full of amazing bargains on Black Friday.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot made a bargain with the cat for extra treats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, time is the ultimate bargain.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sign outside the store promised unbelievable bargains.

meanings.definition: Something offered or acquired at a price advantageous to the buyer.
meanings.sent1: He always looks for bargains when shopping for groceries.
meanings.sent2: The clearance section had some incredible bargains on clothes.
meanings.sent3: The magician's best bargain was a hat that could produce endless rabbits.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a bargain that brightened up his day.
meanings.sent5: The antique vase she bought for a bargain turned out to be worth a fortune.
